column2: "Na afei Festus baa ɔmansin no mu no
column3: ne ndaansa ekyir no ofii Kaesarea kɔr Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na asɔfompanyin nye Jewfo etsitsir no kaa asɛm tsiaa Paul kyerɛɛ no
column3: na wɔserɛɛ adom wɔ no hɔ dɛ"

column2: "ɔnsoma ma wɔnkɛfa Paul mbra Jerusalɛm; na nkyɛ wɔaatsɛw no kwan mu eku no."
"Na Festus dze
column3: obuaa dɛ wɔdze Paul risie wɔ Kaesarea
column4: na nankasa so ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔakɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛm ntsi hom mma hom mu hɔn a wɔwɔ tum no nye me nsian nkɔ
column4: na sɛ biribi a ɔnnsɛ wɔ ɔbarimba yi mu a

column2: "Na odzii hɔn mu bɛyɛ nda awɔtwe anaa dadu no
column3: osianee kɔr Kaesarea; na adze kyee no

column2: "Na ɔbae no
column3: Jewfo a woefi Jerusalɛm aba no botwaa no ho hyiae
column4: na wɔdze nsɛmbɔn pii a ɔyɛ dur toatoaa no a hɔnara woenntum annkyerɛ mu;"

column2: "na Paul yii n'ano dɛ
column3: Jewfo mbra o

column2: "Na Festus pɛɛ dɛ onya Jewfo enyimpa ntsi
column3: obisaa Paul dɛ
column4: Epɛ dɛ ekɔ Jerusalɛm ma woeebu wo ndzɛmba yi ho atsɛn wɔ m'enyim anaa?"

column2: "Na Paul see dɛ
column3: Migyina Kaesar asɛndzigua enyim
column4: mbrɛ ɔsɛ dɛ wobu me atsɛn: Jewfo dze
column6: dɛ mbrɛ woara so inyim yie no."

column2: "Na sɛ mayɛ bɔn
column3: anaa sɛ mayɛ biribi a ɔsɛ wu a
column4: mommpow dɛ mubowu; na sɛ ndzɛmba a yinom rotoa m'ano wɔ ho yi nnyɛ nokwar a
column5: obi runntum mmfa me nnhyɛ hɔn nsa. Emi dze

column2: "Nna Festus nye baguafo no tuu egyina no
column3: obuaa dɛ

column2: "Na nda bi ekyir no
column3: Ɔhen Agrippa nye Bernise baa Kaesarea

column2: "Na wodzii hɔ nda pii no
column3: Festus dze Paul ho asɛm no too ɔhen no enyim dɛ
column4: Ɔbarimba bi wɔ hɔ a Feliks gyaa no mpokyerɛ mu:"

column2: "ɔno na mokɔr Jerusalɛm no
column3: asɔfompanyin nye Jewfo mpanyin no kaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ me serɛɛ me dɛ mumbu no atsɛn."

column2: "Na mubuaa hɔn dɛ ɔnnyɛ Romefo amambra dɛ wobeyi nyimpa bi ama
column3: gyedɛ nyia wɔrobɔ no ho nkuro no nye no nkurobɔfo no edzi enyim na enyim
column4: na onya kwan yi n'ano wɔ dza wɔdze ato no do ho ansaana."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wobehyiaa ha no
column3: mannyɛ ekyim
column4: na adze kyee no mekɛtsenaa asɛndzigua do na mehyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa ɔbarimba no mbra."

column2: "Na no nkurobɔfo no begyinaa hɔ no
column3: wɔannka emumuyɛdze a mususui no mu biara ho asɛm annto no do
column5: "na hɔnankasa hɔn nyamesom ho ekyingye a wɔnye no gyee no ho
column6: na Jesus bi a oewu a Paul so se dɛ ɔtse ase no ho dze."

column2: "Na dɛ minnyim mbrɛ mebɛyɛ mahwehwɛ iyinom mu ntsi
column3: mibisaa no dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔbɔkɔ Jerusalɛm ma woeekobu no atsɛn wɔ nsɛm yi ho anaa."

column2: "Na Paul dze asɛm no kɛdaan ɔhempɔn no dɛ wɔmfa no nsie ma onkodu n'enyim ntsi
column3: mehyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa no nsie ma onkodu dɛ mobɔsoma ma wɔdze no akɛma Kaesar."

column2: "Nna Agrippa see Festus dɛ
column3: Nkyɛ mo so mepɛ dɛ mitsie nyimpa no. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na afei adze kyee no
column3: Agrippa nye Bernise dze ahokeka kɛse bae
column4: na wɔnye asafohen mpanyin no binom
column5: nye kurow no mu mbapɔmba no

column2: "Na Festus see dɛ
column3: Ɔhen Agrippa
column4: nye mbarimba a hom nye hɛn wɔ ha nyina
column5: hom nhwɛ nyimpa yi a Jewfo nyimpadodow nyina serɛɛ me tsiaa no wɔ Jerusalɛm nye ha
column6: na wɔtseatseaa mu dɛ ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔtsena ase bio no."

column2: "Naaso muhun dɛ ɔannyɛ biribi a ɔsɛ wu; na nankasa dze asɛm no akɛdan ɔhempɔn no ntsi mahyɛ dɛ mobɔsoma no hɔ."
"Naaso minnyi biribi tsitsir biara a mebɛkyerɛw akɛma mo wura wɔ no ho. Dɛm ntsi na medze no aba hom enyim
column3: nkanka ɔwo

column2: "Ɔyɛ me dɛ nyansa biara nnyi mu dɛ medze daduanyi mobɔkɔ
column3: na mennkɛkyerɛ asɛm kor a wɔdze ato no do."
